jobDescription: I have an immediate full time need for a SQL Data Analyst in the northern suburbs. This financial firm is in growth mode so it's an exciting time to join the team!  As a SQL Data Analyst you will going to take charge of entire database in terms of process and maintaining the data integrity for the entire firm. The SQL Data Analyst will have a strong voice and should be comfortable presenting opportunities directly to the C-Level. Responsibilities: Identifies requirements by establishing personal rapport with persons in a position to understand service requirements.  Creates and maintains queries and performs analytics and reporting functions  Confirms program operation by conducting tests; modifying program sequence and/or codes  Develops and maintains applications and databases by evaluating client needs; analyzing requirements; developing software systems.  This position offers a competitive base salary, great benefits, paid time off, and an emphasis on work/life balance.  Interviews are actively occurring, if you are interested in this exciting position please send your resume directly to Suzanna D'Silva Directly at suzanna.dsilva@rht.com
